name: Idle Karma
description:
Open chakras, reach higher level of consciousness, breake the cycle of reincarnation in this game.

It's mostly idle, but needs your attention to go through it.

Unlike the most idle games - this one was designed to be completed. And provide you some fresh idle experience with random upgrades every Reincarnation (prestige). You will be playing for bunch of different creatures, each one have it's own characteristics and bonuses, providing different player experience. Hope you will enjoy it!
